title: Who is responsible for trimming and cleaning the median and sides of Route 17 from the Leland ramp to the Cape Fear bridge? From Leland to a waterway bridge after the Brunswick River looks pretty well-maintained so kudos to those responsible. But the rest of the roadway to the bridge is overgrown, unkempt, and is an eyesore as an entrance to the great waterfront city of Wilmington.
text:
I believe this previous post to MyReporter.com will answer your
question: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4003
